nodes.excerpt: Without any coding expertise, you can set up Google Tag Manager, Google Analytics 4, Facebook Pixels, and Universal Analytics Enhanced Ecommerce and many others into your Shopify store. Analyzify comes up with a Done-For-You setup option at no extra cost.

localize.description: 不需要任何编码的专业知识，你就可以在你的Shopify商店中设置Google Tag Manager、Google Analytics 4、Facebook Pixels和Universal Analytics Enhanced Ecommerce以及其他许多功能。Analyzify提供了一个Don-For-You的设置选项，没有额外的费用。
localize.tagline: 谷歌标签管理和分析应用程序，为您的Shopify商店。

nodes.excerpt: With embed.so, you just need to upload a video, and you will get the embed code in minutes. Place the code to your website, and see the video gets displayed 🤩 It's time to upgrade your website, make it more personal and engaging! 💪
nodes.title: embed.so - Embed videos to make your website more personal and engaging
nodes.author: Damon Chen

localize.description: 有了embed.so，你只需要上传一个视频，你会在几分钟内得到嵌入代码。将代码放置到您的网站，并看到视频显示🤩现在是时候升级您的网站，使其更加个性化和吸引人! 💪
localize.tagline: 嵌入视频，使您的网站更加个性化和吸引人。

localize.description: 有了embed.so，你只需要上傳一個視頻，你會在幾分鐘內得到嵌入代碼。將代碼放置到您的網站，並看到視頻顯示🤩現在是時候升級您的網站，使其更加個性化和吸引人! 💪

nodes.excerpt: This free tool determines if your website follows the 7 key factors and if its complaint with Google's Core Web Vitals. Knowing where your website stands will help you prepare for the upcoming Google Page Experience Update in May!
nodes.title: Page Experience Checker by Cloudways - Test 7 factors of website compliance with core web vitals
nodes.author: Muhammad Saad Khan

localize.description: 这个免费的工具可以确定你的网站是否遵循了7个关键因素，以及是否对谷歌的核心网站生命体征进行了投诉。了解您的网站所处的位置将帮助您为即将到来的谷歌页面体验更新做好准备。
localize.tagline: 测试网站符合核心网络生命体征的7个因素

localize.tagline: 測試網站符合核心網絡生命體徵的7個因素

nodes.excerpt: Bobson is a powerful web doc creation tool that gets everything and everyone on the same page. Gather content from any source and tell the whole story. Share it in a link, and get instant intelligence on opens, views, clicks, and more.

nodes.excerpt: This cloud-based tool will help you analyze your Facebook profile by providing detailed info on who is engaging with your posts! Find who is inactive and delete them with a few clicks. Easily automate friend's request process.

localize.tagline: 删除不活跃的Facebook好友，知道谁取消了对你的关注。

localize.description: 這個基於雲計算的工具將幫助你分析你的Facebook資料，提供關於誰在參與你的帖子的詳細信息! 找到誰是不活躍的，並刪除他們只需點擊幾下。輕鬆地自動處理朋友的請求過程。
localize.tagline: 刪除不活躍的Facebook好友，知道誰取消了對你的關注。

nodes.excerpt: Teams use Ditto to manage and componentize the words across their product from design to production. ⚡ Eliminate error-prone copying and pasting and let developers get back to building. Use our API/CLI to pull up-to-date copy into local directories.

nodes.excerpt: The SEO Onpage extension for Google Chrome that makes SEO daily tasks easier, as you can check easily if the url you are browsing has any Onpage SEO issues, even if the web uses Javascript rendering. It integrates with "Inspect URL" in Google Search Console.
nodes.title: SEO Station - The SEO Onpage extension for Chrome that makes SEO easier
nodes.author: Carlos Estévez

localize.description: Google Chrome浏览器的SEO Onpage扩展，让SEO日常工作变得更简单，因为你可以轻松地检查你正在浏览的url是否有任何Onpage SEO问题，即使网页使用Javascript渲染。它集成了谷歌搜索控制台中的 "检查URL"。
localize.tagline: 让SEO更容易的Chrome浏览器的SEO Onpage扩展功能

localize.description: Google Chrome瀏覽器的SEO Onpage擴展，讓SEO日常工作變得更簡單，因爲你可以輕鬆地檢查你正在瀏覽的url是否有任何Onpage SEO問題，即使網頁使用Javascript渲染。它集成了谷歌搜索控制檯中的 "檢查URL"。
localize.tagline: 讓SEO更容易的Chrome瀏覽器的SEO Onpage擴展功能

nodes.excerpt: Whether you're a maker, content creator, freelancer, indie hacker, influencer, or thought leader, The Creator System will help you stay organised and on track. You no longer need to rely solely on your motivation or inspiration to get things done.
nodes.title: The Creator System - Be organised, stay productive and produce outcomes in Notion
nodes.author: Isabel Nyo

localize.description: 无论你是制造者、内容创作者、自由职业者、独立黑客、影响者还是思想领袖，《创客系统》都将帮助你保持组织性和正轨性。你不再需要仅仅依靠你的动机或灵感来完成事情。
localize.tagline: 有条不紊，保持生产力，并在Notion中产生成果。

localize.description: 無論你是製造者、內容創作者、自由職業者、獨立黑客、影響者還是思想領袖，《創客系統》都將幫助你保持組織性和正軌性。你不再需要僅僅依靠你的動機或靈感來完成事情。
localize.tagline: 有條不紊，保持生產力，並在Notion中產生成果。

nodes.excerpt: Tally is a new type of form builder. Just start typing and build forms for all purposes in seconds. Without knowing how to code, and for free!
nodes.title: Tally - The simplest way to create forms for free
nodes.author: Filip Minev

localize.description: Tally是一种新型的表单构建器。只需开始输入并在几秒钟内建立各种用途的表单。不需要知道如何编写代码，而且是免费的。

localize.description: Tally是一種新型的表單構建器。只需開始輸入並在幾秒鐘內建立各種用途的表單。不需要知道如何編寫代碼，而且是免費的。
localize.tagline: 免費創建表格的最簡單方法

nodes.excerpt: B2B buyers are tired of the traditional sales process and want a B2C like buying experience. Deal Rooms transform your sales process to sell B2B buyers how they want to be sold. Open to close, deal rooms help your sales teams sell more and sell fast.
nodes.title: Referenceable - Deal rooms create B2C like buying experiences for B2B buyers
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

localize.description: B2B买家已经厌倦了传统的销售流程，他们希望获得类似B2C的购买体验。Deal Rooms将改变您的销售流程，以B2B买家想要的方式进行销售。从开放到关闭，交易室帮助您的销售团队卖得更多，卖得更快。
localize.tagline: 交易室为B2B买家创造类似B2C的购买体验

localize.description: B2B買家已經厭倦了傳統的銷售流程，他們希望獲得類似B2C的購買體驗。Deal Rooms將改變您的銷售流程，以B2B買家想要的方式進行銷售。從開放到關閉，交易室幫助您的銷售團隊賣得更多，賣得更快。
localize.tagline: 交易室爲B2B買家創造類似B2C的購買體驗
